Posts.Content: Feb 18, 2009 07:50PM allie1075 wrote: I only had one drain and had the same question as you.  My doc removed the staples and drain 3 weeks after surgery, I was so ready to have it done.  I felt more like a patient instead of a person while they were in, hang in there.  I have a list of all the abbreviations, but do not know what ac stands for.  Can anyone let me know what it means.  Thanks. Good luck and am hoping the drains will be removed soon. Allie
Posts.Title: Drains ~ how long do they stay in????????? 2new1s ToniSkane
